algorithm.name: FACECV
algorithm.description: Detects faces in images and videos using the Open Computer Vision (OCV) library.

properties.name: MIN_INITIAL_CONFIDENCE
properties.description: Minimum face detection confidence value needed to start a track, must be greater than 0.

properties.name: MIN_FACE_SIZE
properties.description: Minimum x and y pixel size passed to the opencv face detector.

properties.name: MAX_FEATURE
properties.description: Max feature points calculated when detecting features on the face.

properties.name: MIN_INIT_POINT_COUNT
properties.description: Minimum points needed by feature detector within detected face bounding box.

properties.name: MIN_POINT_PERCENT
properties.description: Min point percentage when comparing current feature points to initial feature points - when the ratio drops below 0.70 the track could be lost.

properties.name: MAX_OPTICAL_FLOW_ERROR
properties.description: (UNUSED) Option to ignore certain points that do not meet a certain quality when using the calcopticalflow algorithm.

properties.name: VERBOSE
properties.description: VERBOSE = 1: print settings and detection results and VERBOSE = 0: no debugging output.

actions.name: OCV FACE DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the OpenCV face detection algorithm using the default parameters.

actions.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH AUTO-ORIENTATION) ACTION
actions.description: Executes the OpenCV face detection algorithm and rotates and/or flips media based on EXIF data or video metadata.

tasks.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH AUTO-ORIENTATION) TASK
tasks.description: Executes the OpenCV face detection algorithm and rotates and/or flips media based on EXIF data or video metadata.

pipelines.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs OpenCV face detection and marks up the results.

pipelines.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH MOG MOTION PREPROCESSOR) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs MOG motion preprocessing and OpenCV face detection.

pipelines.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH SUBSENSE MOTION PREPROCESSOR) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs SuBSENSE motion preprocessing and OpenCV face detection.

pipelines.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH MOG MOTION PREPROCESSOR AND MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs MOG motion preprocessing, OpenCV face detection, and markup.

pipelines.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH SUBSENSE MOTION PREPROCESSOR AND MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs SuBSENSE motion preprocessing, OpenCV face detection, and markup.

pipelines.name: OCV FACE DETECTION (WITH AUTO-ORIENTATION) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Executes the OpenCV face detection algorithm and rotates and/or flips media based on EXIF data or video metadata.
